Writer, psychologist & educator here to learn & share info on politics, psych, education, history &, especially, structural power. Antifascist, anti-oligarchy, atheist. I boost what I find interesting, regardless of whether I agree with it. Resisting fascism includes countering disinformation with facts. I prefer evidence, not evidence-free opinion. Image: Rothko #61
My opinions are always improving.

The UN report, entitled "Anatomy of a Genocide", says Israel has violated three of the five acts listed in the UN Genocide Convention.

Israel is on the UN's “black list” of countries and organizations that harm children. On the so-called “list of shame”, Israel is listed alongside “terrorist groups” such as Daesh/ISIS, al-Qaida and Boko Haram.

The UN’s international court of justice (ICJ) has ordered Israel to end its occupation of the Palestinian territories “as rapidly as possible”.

Project Gutenberg, founded in 1971, is the oldest producer and distributor of free ebooks.

According to Michael Hart (March 8, 1947 – September 6, 2011), founder of Project Gutenberg, the mission of Project Gutenberg is simple: to encourage the creation and distribution of eBooks.
This mission is, as much as possible, to encourage all those who are interested in making eBooks and helping to give them away.

Bigots and transphobes will be blocked on sight

🏳️‍⚧️ #LGBwiththeT 🏳️‍🌈 #LGBTQIA 🏆 Award-winning news service established in 2002 to cover Harry Potter, now reporting on the demise of JK Rowling's legacy.

Since 2020 — and now in our twenty-second year — we've been following the disturbing links between JKR's anti-LGBTQ+ bigotry and far-right, conservative & religious groups and their rhetoric.

Today, we advocate a boycott of all of Rowling's work, since she views it as tacit support for her bigoted positions.
